mapper.select: select hkl.id,hk.status as keyStatus,b.name as deptName,hkl.keyId,hk.deptId, hkl.operatType,hkl.content,hk.operator,hkl.addTime,hkl.updateTime,hkl.isValid from hs_keylog hkl inner join hs_key hk on hkl.keyId=hk.id inner join sys_dept b on hk.deptId = b.id where hk.id= #{hsKeyId} and hkl.isvalid = 1
select id,realName from sys_user where id=#{borrower}
